title: Machine Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Mentoring Program for New Higher Education Instructors as Reflective Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational education theory and subject-matter expertise in science
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Novice instructors can acquire lesson design skills using the 5-stage Reflective Practitioner Model (Experience-Reflection-Conceptualization-Experimentation-Application) within 4 weeks.
Based on feedback collected during mentoring, ≥80% of participants can establish teaching method improvement plans.
After conducting ≥3 simulated lessons via VR simulations, learners can collect and incorporate specific feedback from peers and mentors.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
